description: Sun-kissed cutie Maddox can’t wait to get into slender, lean Blake’s personal space, but before the fun begins they took some time out to play some ball in the field. “I’m happy to meet this guy right here! I mean look at him, look at all this man, and I like hairy guys too,” says Maddox feeling on Blake’s hairy chest. “Are you already bulging?” asks Blake. “It’s all the chest hair man, common,” answers Maddox. He continues, “His figure is great; he clearly takes care of himself. I heard he has a great ass! Can’t wait to sample some of that!” “I like the cocky ones,” replies Blake.
title: Maddox & Blake : Bareback
